attributes.action: Reject the proposed EU ruling that vehicle headlights must be on at all times including daytime. This will do nothing for safety and would not be environmentaly friendly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each vehicle will use over 100W of power derived from the petrol driving it and causing more pollution. For every 10 that will be 1Kw. How many vehicles on the road at any on time? If only 1million that would be a huge 100Mw being wasted. There can be no justification for this waste especially on a bright sunny day. It realy is time to show who is running Great Britain and that we will not tollerate such nonsense thought up by non elected Eurocrats.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reject the proposed EU ruling that vehicle headlights must be on at all times including daytime. This will do nothing for safety and would not be environmentaly friendly."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11400.asp
